data.answer: There are a lot of ways for schools and communities to promote healthy habits in children and adolescents. First of all, schools can have classes specifically designed to teach children what healthy habits they need to have. Secondly, teachers should pay attention to children's healthy habits when they are at school. Adults in local communities should be role models by doing the right thing when it comes to personal hygiene. For example, washing hands frequently is very important to prevent diseases from spreading. Overall, it is essential for schools and communities to disseminate the message that healthy habits are important.
data.referenceText: How can schools and communities promote healthy habits in children and adolescents?
data.referenceTranslate: 学校和社区如何促进儿童和青少年的健康习惯?
